results.title: Going forward
results.creator_credit: Laura Bell, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Laura Bell reflects on her life through the things that have made her proud. Bell’s family, her community and her achievements are what keep her driven and passionate about her work.

results.title: These things I still question
results.creator_credit: Ken Saunders, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Ken Saunders questions the things in his life that he didn’t understand, like why his dad was treated differently, why he couldn’t play with the white kids and why people just let this happen.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Ken Saunders, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Ken Saunders questions the things in his life that he didn’t understand, like why his dad was treated differently, why he couldn’t play with the white kids and why people just let this happen.
description_for_label: Ken Saunders questions the things in his life that he didn’t understand, like why his dad was treated differently, why he couldn’t play with the white kids and why people just let this happen.

results.title: My family
results.brief_description: Salma gives a first-hand account of being a refugee. Fleeing the conflict in Sudan, she talks about the pain and anxiety of her journey to Australia, as well as the gratitude she feels for her new country.
results.description: Salma gives a first-hand account of being a refugee. Fleeing the conflict in Sudan, she talks about the pain and anxiety of her journey to Australia, as well as the gratitude she feels for her new country.
description_for_label: Salma gives a first-hand account of being a refugee. Fleeing the conflict in Sudan, she talks about the pain and anxiety of her journey to Australia, as well as the gratitude she feels for her new country.

results.title: 'Remembrance of things past'...a watercolour memoir for Richard
results.brief_description: When Judith recalls Richard’s legacy, she sees it through his watercolour paintings that stand as a aesthetic record to his life, from his childhood to his adult academic pursuits.
results.title_for_label: ‘Remembrance of things past’…a watercolour memoir for Richard
results.description: When Judith recalls Richard’s legacy, she sees it through his watercolour paintings that stand as a aesthetic record to his life, from his childhood to his adult academic pursuits.
description_for_label: When Judith recalls Richard’s legacy, she sees it through his watercolour paintings that stand as a aesthetic record to his life, from his childhood to his adult academic pursuits.

results.title: Breathe
results.creator_credit: Yan Wawrzynczak, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.brief_description: Yan Wawrzynczak weaves a moving story about a man, the woman he fell in love with and their child. Over several continents and many years, Wawrzynczak covers the changing seasons of this relationship as the three move in and out of each other’s lives.
results.creator_credit_for_label: Yan Wawrzynczak, ACMI Digital Storytelling and ACMI
results.description: Yan Wawrzynczak weaves a moving story about a man, the woman he fell in love with and their child. Over several continents and many years, Wawrzynczak covers the changing seasons of this relationship as the three move in and out of each other’s lives.
description_for_label: Yan Wawrzynczak weaves a moving story about a man, the woman he fell in love with and their child. Over several continents and many years, Wawrzynczak covers the changing seasons of this relationship as the three move in and out of each other’s lives.
